body_html: It turns out that this issue has nothing to do with PyTorch and it is caused by IOMMU which causing troubles in P2P GPU traffic. By adding the 'iommu=soft' option in grub as described here the issue was resolved.

body: It turns out that this issue has nothing to do with PyTorch and it is caused by IOMMU which causing troubles in P2P GPU traffic. By adding the 'iommu=soft' option in grub as described [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1637#issuecomment-338268158) the issue was resolved.
